statement.p: Vasya's initial salary is 58300. If she receives a raise of 4900 each year, what is the first year her salary is greater (or equal to) 100,000?

solution.p: Her salary must increase more than 100,000-58300 = 41700. This will take \displaystyle\frac{{41700}}{{4900}}={8.5102040816327} years. Because she won't be more than 100,000 until the final, full year that is 9 years.
